column2:
"Wow, is this what that mystery fruit looks like?
I've never seen it before."

"Thanks so much!
But, it's a little different
than what I imagined..."

"I had planned on roasting it, but maybe I should
try mashing it instead."

"Anyway, I have a feeling it's going to expand my
recipe horizons significantly. Sorry I'm never
able to offer more, but please accept this."
